message: Hey Bob, I'm offering you my product for $90. It's a great deal, and I know you'll love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you be open to selling it for $75?
Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm not quite ready to go that low. How about $85? I'm willing to negotiate a bit more, but I can't go any lower than that.
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I'm willing to pay $80 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
